DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether active repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation leave dorsolateral prefrontal cortex safe effective preventive treatment chronic migraine , compare placebo repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Double-blind Randomized Clinical Trial Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Chronic Migraine
DOC.detailed_description: Patients chronic migraine accord criterion International Headache Society randomize either active repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation leave dorsolateral prefrontal cortex placebo repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation , total 23 session treatment ( 15 session first month 8 session second month treatment ) . Outcomes evaluated baseline , one , two month treatment , one month end treatment
DOC.criteria: chronic migraine accord criterion International Headache Society change prophylactic medication past 3 month neurological disorder bipolar disorder alcohol drug dependence past 2 month suicidal ideation , psychotic symptom contraindication transcranial magnetic stimulation ( cardiac pacemaker , implant electronic device , metal skull , skull fracture , history seizure ) use antidepressant past 4 week pregnancy lack birthcontrol method woman childbearing age
